season the steak with salt and pepper. <-> once the grill is heated up, put the steak on the grill. <-> close the grill lid. <-> open the grill lid. <-> move the steak away from the flame. <-> flip the steak to cook the other side. <-> check your steak's internal temperature. <-> take the steak from the grill. <-> top the steak with your preferred sauce. <-> cut the steak into smaller pieces. <-> taste the steak. <->
